definition: to act without taking time to think (idiom); to react instantly/to fire from the hip
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: He handed it out without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 他不假思索的把它交了上去。

sentences.english: She acted in an off-hand way.
Imprudently , he downed tools and ran home to make his wife happy .
sentences.chinese: 他不假思索地放下工具狂奔回家去讓妻子也高興一下。

sentences.english: Here, leaning over the banister, I cried out suddenly, and without at all deliberating on my words.
sentences.chinese: 這時，我撲出欄杆，突然不假思索地大叫了一聲。
我不假思索地脫口而出。

sentences.english: A habit is the act of doing an action, over and over, usually without thought.
sentences.chinese: 習慣通常是不假思索地一遍又一遍地重複做一個動作。
你能不假思索的脫口而出嗎？
“住手，”我不假思索的朝它吼道。

sentences.english: But now, I can unthinkingly in the market do what I want to do.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在，我可以不假思索地在場上做我想做的事情。

sentences.english: The answer was snapped back without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 格里利不假思索地答道。

sentences.english: You are trashing and polluting Her body without any thought.
sentences.chinese: 你們不假思索任意破壞和污染她的身體。

definition: see 不假思索[bu4 jia3 si1 suo3]
lit. to chop the nail and slice the iron (idiom)/fig. resolute and decisive/unhesitating/categorical
different mouths, same voice/to speak in unison (idiom)
to blurt out/to let slip (an indiscreet remark)
not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
calm and unhurried (idiom); composed/to take matters calmly
